item.title: OMG! The blog is working
item.description: And not only working. It’s fully automated with the help of CircleCI. How it works? The blog files are stored on GitHub. It’s markdown. Every time I do a commit in order to create or update a page, the blog gets regenerated and published on GitHub Pages. I spent some time configuring CircleCI to automatically publish blog’s content. I’m going to explain how to do it in the next post.
